# API Reference for cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator

   IFragmentConcatenator <a name="IFragmentConcatenator" id="cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator"></a>
  
  - *Implemented By:* <a href="#cdktf.StringConcat">StringConcat</a>, <a href="#cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator">IFragmentConcatenator</a>
  
  Function used to concatenate symbols in the target document language.
  
  Interface so it could potentially be exposed over jsii.
  
  # Methods <a name="Methods" id="Methods"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator.join">Join</a></code> | Join the fragment on the left and on the right. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `Join` <a name="Join" id="cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator.join"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  private object Join(object Left, object Right)
  ```
  
  Join the fragment on the left and on the right.
  
  ### `Left`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="Left" id="cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator.join.parameter.left"></a>
  
  - *Type:* object

  ### `Right`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="Right" id="cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator.join.parameter.right"></a>
  
  - *Type:* object
